name: ColdFusion: Avoid Templates with more than X Functions
description: Templates should have less than X Functions The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output:
This report lists all the Templates having more than X Functions.
It provides the following information:
- Template full name
- Number of Functions
rationale: For maintainability and readability reasons, Templates should not have too many Functions
remediation: Review the Template design to reduce the number of Functions
